front.title: DTNMA Application Management Model (AMM) and Data Models

author.organization: The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory

abstract.t: This document defines a data model that captures the information necessary to asynchronously manage applications within the Delay- Tolerant Networking Management Architecture (DTNMA). This model provides a set of common type definitions, data structures, and a template for publishing standardized representations of model elements.
